tool_description: An API showing global climate change news
name: Hot Air Live
title: Hot Air Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get news about climate change from specific sources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hot-air-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hot-air-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hot-air-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{sourceid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hot-air-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Climate Change News
api_list.description: This returns all news about climate change from international sources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hot-air-live.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hot-air-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
